- Sprint 8: Agent Handoff & Collaboration (31 points)
- Sprint 9: GroupChat & Multi-turn Conversation (42 points)
- Sprint 10: Dynamic Planning & Autonomous Decision (42 points)
- Sprint 11: Nested Workflows & Advanced Orchestration (39 points)
- Sprint 12: Integration & Polish (34 points)

Total Phase 2: 222 Story Points across 6 sprints

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(sprint-8): Complete Agent Handoff & Collaboration (Phase 2)

Sprint 8 implementation includes:
- S8-1: HandoffController (8 pts) - Core handoff execution with 3 policies
- S8-2: HandoffTrigger (5 pts) - 6 trigger types with condition parser
- S8-3: CollaborationProtocol (8 pts) - Agent messaging and session management
- S8-4: CapabilityMatcher (5 pts) - Intelligent agent capability matching
- S8-5: Handoff API (5 pts) - Complete REST API for handoff operations

Key features:
- HandoffPolicy: IMMEDIATE, GRACEFUL, CONDITIONAL
- TriggerType: CONDITION, EVENT, TIMEOUT, ERROR, CAPABILITY, EXPLICIT
- MessageType: REQUEST, RESPONSE, BROADCAST, NEGOTIATE, ACKNOWLEDGE
- MatchStrategy: BEST_FIT, FIRST_FIT, ROUND_ROBIN, LEAST_LOADED
- 15 built-in agent capabilities

Total: 31 story points, 277 tests passing

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\rci.ChrisLai\\Documents\\GitHub\\ai-semantic-kernel-framework-project" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(sprint-41\): Complete Additional MCP Servers \(35 pts\)

Sprint 41 implementation includes:
- S41-1: Shell MCP Server \(10 pts\)
  - ShellExecutor with security controls \(whitelist/blacklist\)
  - Dangerous command pattern blocking \(rm -rf, fork bombs, wget|sh\)
  - Support for PowerShell, Bash, CMD
  - Timeout and output size limits

- S41-2: Filesystem MCP Server \(8 pts\)
  - FilesystemSandbox with path validation
  - Blocked patterns for sensitive files \(.env, *.pem, *.key\)
  - File size limits and optional write/delete permissions
  - Tools: read_file, write_file, list_directory, search_files, get_file_info, delete_file

- S41-3: SSH MCP Server \(10 pts\)
  - SSHClient with connection pooling
  - Key-based and password authentication
  - SFTP file transfer support
  - Host whitelist/blacklist

- S41-4: LDAP MCP Server \(7 pts\)
  - LDAPClient with connection pooling
  - TLS/SSL support
  - Read-only mode by default
  - User and group search tools

Total: 35 story points, 21 MCP tools

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\rci.ChrisLai\\Documents\\GitHub\\ai-semantic-kernel-framework-project" commit -m "feat\(sprint-42\): Complete Session Management Core \(35 pts\)

Sprint 42 implementation includes:
- S42-1: Session Domain Models \(8 pts\)
  - Session, Message, Attachment, ToolCall models
  - SessionStatus state machine \(CREATED -> ACTIVE <-> SUSPENDED -> ENDED\)
  - MessageRole, AttachmentType, ToolCallStatus enums

- S42-2: Session Storage Layer \(10 pts\)
  - SQLAlchemySessionRepository for PostgreSQL persistence
  - SessionCache for Redis caching \(write-through strategy\)
  - SessionModel, MessageModel, AttachmentModel ORM classes

- S42-3: Session Service Layer \(10 pts\)
  - SessionService for business logic and lifecycle management
  - SessionEventPublisher with 15 event types
  - Async event publishing and subscription support

- S42-4: Session REST API \(7 pts\)
  - 13 REST endpoints for session management
  - Pydantic schemas for request/response validation
  - Session lifecycle, messages, attachments, tool-calls

Key features:
- Dual storage: PostgreSQL \(persistent\) + Redis \(cache\)
- Event-driven architecture for real-time updates
- State machine for session lifecycle management
- TTL: Session 2h, Messages 1h

Total: 35 story points, 14 files, 4047 lines

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\rci.ChrisLai\\Documents\\GitHub\\ai-semantic-kernel-framework-project" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(sprint-44\): Complete Session Features \(30 pts\)

Sprint 44 implementation includes:
- S44-1: File Analysis \(10 pts\)
  - FileAnalyzer with Strategy Pattern routing
  - DocumentAnalyzer, ImageAnalyzer, CodeAnalyzer, DataAnalyzer
  - Multimodal LLM and Code Interpreter integration

- S44-2: File Generation \(8 pts\)
  - FileGenerator with Factory Pattern routing
  - CodeGenerator, ReportGenerator, DataExporter
  - Support for Markdown, HTML, CSV, JSON, Excel, XML

- S44-3: History Management \(7 pts\)
  - HistoryManager with pagination and filtering
  - BookmarkService with tags and colors \(D44-3\)
  - SearchService with engine fallback to database

- S44-4: Advanced Features \(5 pts\)
  - TagService with 6 system preset tags
  - StatisticsService with lazy calculation + cache \(D44-4\)
  - TemplateService with 5 system templates

Key patterns:
- Strategy Pattern for file type routing
- Factory Pattern for generation type routing
- Lazy Calculation + 5min TTL cache for statistics

Total: 30 story points, 18 domain files, 7591 lines

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
